trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Coventry
There were no other sightings in Coventry on or around February 4th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: saw light zip across sky,shot 2 frames on digital slr.
divs: Sighting Detailsstood outside in back garden,looking for ufos(have seen several before),with my new canon 400d slr switched on and set.after about half an hour,saw a fast moving yellowish light flying very rapidly across a patch of blue sky,and heading for some clouds.within a second ,shot 3 frames with my 10 mp slr,but was not sure if i had caught object due to speed and clouds.when i checked the images later,the object shows up on 2 out of 3 frames.the object was in the north -west sky ,heading away from me,at an elevation of about 20 -25 degrees.i am an amateur astronomer,but i do NOT think this was a meteor.it appears in front of the clouds,and does not seem very far away.there was no smoke or particles left by the object,and no sound was heard.the sun was out at the time,but the object seems to be luminous. on the 2 frames that the object shows up on,it does not seem to have moved at all,yet it was moving very rapidly(faster than a fighter aircraft)when spotted,and in the third frame,taken less than a second later,the object is no longer visible. when i saw the object,i instantly thought "ufo".i have seen 1000s of meteors in my life,so i can eliminate that explanation.there is no way for it to be an aircraft,due to speed of flight,no structure ,etc. lost sight of object when photographing it.i was not optimistic that i had imaged it,because it looked like it was flying into some clouds.told my partner about it straight away.she said "dont get mud on the kitchen floor"!! image1 and image2 were taken about a second apart
